seo.title: HTML Formatter: Free Online Tool for Code Beautification
seo.description: HTML Formatter is a free online tool that beautifies your code to make it clean and readable. Ideal for developers, it supports multiple features and languages.
seo.keywords: HTML Formatter, Code Beautifier, Online HTML Formatter, Web Developer Tools, Free Formatter, Code Cleaner, HTML Tools, Web Development
seo.long_tail_content: Use our HTML Formatter tool for efficient and high-quality code beautification. Ideal for professional developers, coding enthusiasts, and web designers who want to clean and format their HTML code effortlessly.

html.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <title>HTML Formatter</title>
    <style>
        .formatter {
            width: 100%;
            height: 500px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <textarea id='input' class='formatter'></textarea>
    <button onclick='formatHtml()'>Format HTML</button>
    <textarea id='output' class='formatter'></textarea>
    <script>
        function formatHtml() {
            var input = document.getElementById('input').value;
            var output = html_beautify(input);
            document.getElementById('output').value = output;
        }
    </script>
    <script src='https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/js-beautify/1.11.0/beautify-html.min.js'></script>
</body>
</html>
